pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [a78b8eb61c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/18837/commits/a78b8eb61c929f376445189adc477a784187c501)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.AffineSpace`|1785|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ AffineSpace`
`+ SpecIso`
`+ SpecIso_hom_app_top`
`+ SpecIso_inv_app_top_coord`
`+ SpecIso_inv_over`
`+ comp_homOfVector`
`+ coord`
`+ ext_of_isAffine`
`+ functor`
`+ homOfVector`
`+ homOfVector_app_top_coord`
`+ homOfVector_over`
`+ homOfVector_toSpecMvPoly`
`+ homOverEquiv`
`+ hom_ext`
`+ instance (v : n ‚Üí Œì(X, ‚ä§)) : (homOfVector (X ‚Üò S) v).IsOver S`
`+ instance [IsAffine S] : IsAffine ùî∏(n; S) := isAffine_of_isIso (isoOfIsAffine n S).hom`
`+ isoOfIsAffine`
`+ isoOfIsAffine_hom_app_top`
`+ isoOfIsAffine_inv_app_top_coord`
`+ isoOfIsAffine_inv_over`
`+ map`
`+ mapSpecMap`
`+ map_Spec_map`
`+ map_app_top_coord`
`+ map_comp`
`+ map_id`
`+ map_over`
`+ map_reindex`
`+ of_mvPolynomial_int_ext`
`+ over`
`+ reindex`
`+ reindex_app_top_coord`
`+ reindex_comp`
`+ reindex_id`
`+ reindex_over`
`+ toSpecMvPoly`
`+ toSpecMvPolyIntEquiv`
`+ toSpecMvPolyIntEquiv_comp`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>Increase in tech debt: 12.00</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|1566|12|erw|

Current commit [a78b8eb61c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/a78b8eb61c929f376445189adc477a784187c501)
Reference commit [2ee23a3453](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/2ee23a34530f8024d3c41b837aca27f979aa129e)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
</details>
I'm not sure why the "Post PR summary comment" CI job is failing but the build itself passes.

Ops

bors d+

:v: erdOne can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the review!
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11868111392/job/33076936445)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11868111392/job/33076936393)

Thanks!

bors d√®

Thanks!

bors d√®

The PR looks good to me. However, would there be any significant issue if this started as follows:
```suggestion
variable (n : Type u) (S : Scheme.{max u v})
```
Seems like it just works. Thanks!
`n` and `S` are already in scope, aren't they? (But maybe this is better for readability)
I think it's nice have arguments of defs be explicitly written out.
Can you maybe add a comment explaining that `n` here is not a natural number?
Can this be moved to a file about mv polynomials?
Mmm, maybe not because it is about the category. Not very important.
Yeah this is quite specific about `CommRingCat.of (MvPolynomial n (ULift.{u} ‚Ñ§))` and I doubt it will be used elsewhere.
Can you add a "see `homOverEquiv` for blah blah" to the comment?
Do you think it is reasonable to have it as a functor?
Added.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry): define affine `n`-space
